Description:
This web service will retrieve condition (diagnosis) data from a patient's chart. This includes any data found in the patient's problem list and diagnoses across all encounters. This resource can be queried by a combination of patient ID and status.

Note that this resource retrieves only data stored in problem list records. As a result, medical history data documented outside of a patient's problem list isn't available to applications using this service unless that data is retrieved using another method.

Starting in February 2019, this resource also returns encounter-level diagnoses.

Starting in February 2020, this resource also returns health-concern category data, which includes certain problems in the problem list and the patient's health status.
SampleResponse:
{

"resourceType": "Condition",

"id": "eogxwIG1txVZNCM3dHEOvFowQX2QFI0kgC8kbjCEIA13gv1KXV-KkUMsNeEHnym4NflRgODZ7mPOUPfun4KNHiQ3",

"clinicalStatus": "active",

"verificationStatus": "confirmed",

"assertedDate": "1998-01-10",

"category": [{

"text": "Problem List Item",

"coding": [{

"system": "http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category",

"code": "problem-list-item",

"display": "Problem List Item"

}]

}],

"severity": {"text": "High"},

"code": {

"text": "Black lung disease",

"coding": [

{

"system": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.90",

"code": "J60"

},

{

"system": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.96",

"code": "29422001"

}

]

},

"subject": {

"reference": "https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/e3YS8ClDzw13DmI18v1fpRQ3",

"display": "Jjs, Conditions A"

},

"note": [{"text": "This is the text of the note."}]

}

abatementPeriod.Name: abatementPeriod
abatementPeriod.Description: The date the condition was resolved.

assertedDate.Name: assertedDate
assertedDate.Description: The date the condition was noted.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
For encounter-level diagnoses, this is "encounter-diagnosis". For problems, this is "problem-list-item". For health concerns, this is "health-concern".

Starting in the May 2021 version of Epic, can also include additional category codes based on diagnosis groupers defined by the Epic organization.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description: The status of the problem. Can be active, inactive, or resolved.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The external codes associated with the problem. If a list of codes is sent, they're listed in this element. Otherwise, this element uses the problem name from the name element.

id.Name: id
id.Description: The FHIR ID for this Condition.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Problem

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to the Patient associated with the Condition.

verificationStatus.Name: verificationStatus
verificationStatus.Description: If this is on the patient's local chart, the value is "confirmed". If it is outside data, it is "unconfirmed".
